name: permid-tagger
description: A simple tagger for the permid.org API. Using intervals, it allows you to make up to 500 requests with one function call. Simply pass in a file of your choosing, pick a field which you would like to see tagged and the tagger will return a list of tags. When the tagger is finished, it will save the results to a file of your choosing.
author: Jack Schofield <jackschofield1@gmail.com> (
